==BasicDisplay==
Setup:
*Arduino UNO
*SainSmart 1602 LCD Keypad Shield
*USB power supply.

===Notes:===
* make sure to install keypad library in(MacOS only): 
/Applications/Arduino.app/Contents/Resources/Java/libraries/
* I had to change few things is those libraries to make them work. Missing includes, and replaced old inludes with constants(wiring file). keypad library can be found in ./libraries/keypad directory
